effect.Name: Lighten
effect.description: Lighten - (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Looks at the color information in each channel and selects the base or blend color - whichever is lighter - as the result color. Pixels darker than the blend color are replaced, and pixels lighter than the blend color do not change
